/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a green median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly gray and white, rise up to meet the overcast sky. A few trees punctuate the scene, adding a touch of green to the otherwise monochrome palette. Streetlights line the road, standing sentinel over the cityscape. The image is slightly blurred, lending it a dreamlike quality. Despite the lack of vibrant colors, the image paints a vivid picture of a day in the life of Beijing.
